body.name: Portable Folding Fan, 10000mAh Rechargeable Retractable USB Standing Fan, 4 Speed Ultra Quiet Adjustable Height and Head for Office Bedroom Outdoor Travel Camping Fishing (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 5 hrs 23 mins
features: 【4 in 1 Multifunctional Fan】Portable floor fan with remote control, timing, rotation, night light, foldable stand fan or USB desk fan. Perfect for home bedroom/kitchen/office and field camping, etc., use it as a standing fan, or place it on your desk and use it as a desk fan. You can control the folding fan remotely, which is easy and convenient to operate.

【Large-capacity wireless design】The foldable stand fan is compact and sturdy after being folded, very convenient to carry and put in your bag, no matter at home, travel, outdoor camping, picnic, garden barbecue, the outdoor stand fan increases your comfort and creates coolness environment of. 1000mah rechargeable battery, guaranteed to work wirelessly for 6~24 hours.

【Ultra-quiet four-speed adjustment function】The folding stand/floor fan has four speeds, low/medium/high, and natural wind to meet your different needs. With upgraded technology, the battery powered stand fan is extremely quiet even at maximum speed. The timer function brings you easy convenience, and the removable fan grill makes it very easy to clean.

【Stretch, Fold, Rotate and Adjustable Angle Standing Fan】The portable floor fan is not limited by space, easy to fold up and down, and folds very small. The stretch height is fully adjustable from 4.7 inches to 40 inches, with 70° swivel and 200° adjustable tilt angles including the head that can be tilted back, providing you with more choices of different heights and angles, meeting the needs of more levels.

【Safe and worry-free】HELIJIA foldable floor fans are all provided with a 12-month warranty and a 90-day money-back guarantee. Foldable floor fan design, the convenience of a USB desk fan, the portability of an outdoor standing fan, and wireless operation with a rechargeable battery, it can be easily handled both indoors and outdoors. Support mobile power function to charge the mobile phone.

Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Powerful little fan. I got this for my man so he could have a fan to take with him camping or one he didn’t have to plug in at home. He loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The charge lasts me 2 nights! For the size it throws alot of air! Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Small footprint yet powerful, I've been using nonstop with the warm/hot temperatures this summer.

reviews.reviewText: I love this fan! It's small enough to pack up and bring with you anywhere.

reviews.reviewText: This is super smart design, would love to see larger versions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good battery life; I appreciate the remote & removable front cover
reviews.reviewText: Item: "HELIJIA Portable Folding Fan, 10000mAh Rechargeable Retractable USB Standing Fan, 4 Speed Ultra Quiet Adjustable Height and Head for Office Bedroom Outdoor Travel Camping Fishing (Black)"~Battery life testing, with fan and no rotation:- High: 6.5 hours (low battery light came on after about 3.5)- Medium: 12 hours (low battery light came on after about 10)- Low: 22.5 hours (low battery light came on after about 21)- Charging: somewhere between 6.5 and 7.5 hoursIt's plenty powerful for me on the high setting - I don't feel like I need a higher one.The remote sometimes works all the way across my apartment, which is a little under 30 feet. Even when you're not very far away you have to be somewhat exact about pointing it at the small receiver part on the base, which isn't too much of an issue up close, but from a longer distance it tended to take quite a few tries. (But for realistic purposes, why would you be turning it on from 30 feet away anyway?)It would be nice if they'd put a dim dot of light on the receiver so you can tell where it is, for instance if you're using it at night when you're in bed and the lights are off... or even during the day, since it's the same color as the base and kind of blends in.I like that it folds down small when not in use. It's easy to pull it up to its full height, and to collapse it back down again. Don't forget to hold the little toggle switch to let it finish folding down into the base; it should fold easily without being forced at all.When it's extended to its full height, if you point the fan a little upwards (instead of a little down, or level with the ground) and put it on the highest setting, it tips over backwards. So if you want to use it like that it'll either have to lean back against something, or you'll need something like a bag of rice to set on the base.I wish the beeps for mode changes were silenceable. As an autistic person who's sensitive to sound, they hurt my ears. Using the remote and being further away helps somewhat.The fan itself isn't quieter or louder than a very old plug-in one that I have, but it has a slight electronic whining quality to it that makes it so I can hear it across my apartment while standing several feet from a closed door, when it's on the medium and high settings. If you're not sensitive to sound, maybe you won't be able to hear it like that... and the only reason I had it on in another room from me was to test the battery life overnight.Getting the fan cover off the first time took some effort and multiple angle attempts, but it was pretty easy to put it back on, and easy to take off again after the first time (it doesn't feel like it's going to fall off, though).I appreciate the ability to use its battery for charging a phone or other things, in case of a power outage. I probably won't use it for that during the summer, since I'll want to save the battery for the fan, but it could be nice as an extra backup battery in the winter.Overall, I'm happy with it, and I expect I'll sleep better in the summer this year than last year due to having it. :)
